ë…¼ë¦¬ì  ë™ì¹˜ (Logical Equivalences)

  • De morgan's ë²•ì¹™ (De Morgan):

  • âˆ§\landâˆ§ì— ëŒ€í•œ âˆ¨\lorâˆ¨ì˜ ë¶„ë°° ë²•ì¹™ (distributivity of âˆ§\landâˆ§ over âˆ¨\lorâˆ¨):

Modus Ponens (ê¸ì • ë…¼ë²•)

í•´ìƒë„ë¥¼ í†µí•œ ì¦ëª… (Proof by Resolution)

  • ë‹¨ìœ„ í•´ìƒë„ ì¶”ë¡  ê·œì¹™ (Unit resolution inference rule):

ì—°ì–¸ ì •ê·œí˜• (Conjunctive Normal Form, CNF)

1ì°¨ ë…¼ë¦¬ (First-Order Logic, FOL)

1ì°¨ ë…¼ë¦¬ì˜ êµ¬ë¬¸ (Syntax of First-Order Logic)

ì¡´ì¬ í•œì • ê¸°í˜¸ ë° ì¤‘ì²© í•œì • ê¸°í˜¸ (Existential and Nested Quantifiers)

1ì°¨ ë…¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ì™í¼ìŠ¤ ì„¸ê³„ (The Wumpus World with First-Order Logic)

  • ì§€ê°ì˜ í‘œí˜„: ì§€ê° ë²¡í„°ì™€ ë°œìƒ ì‹œì ì„ í¬í•¨.
    • ì˜ˆ: Percept(âŸ¨Stench,Breeze,Glitter,None,NoneâŸ©,5)\text{Percept}(\langle \text{Stench}, \text{Breeze}, \text{Glitter}, \text{None}, \text{None} \rangle, 5)Percept(âŸ¨Stench,Breeze,Glitter,None,NoneâŸ©,5).
  • ì§€ê°ìœ¼ë¡œë¶€í„° ì‚¬ì‹¤ ë„ì¶œ:
    • âˆ€t,s,g,w,câ€‰Percept(âŸ¨s,Breeze,g,w,câŸ©,t)â‡’Breeze(t)\forall t, s, g, w, c \, \text{Percept}(\langle s, \text{Breeze}, g, w, c \rangle, t) \Rightarrow \text{Breeze}(t)âˆ€t,s,g,w,cPercept(âŸ¨s,Breeze,g,w,câŸ©,t)â‡’Breeze(t)
  • ì¸ì ‘ì„± (Adjacency) ì •ì˜:
    • âˆ€x,y,a,bâ€‰Adjacent(x,y,a,b)â‡”(x=aâˆ§(y=bâˆ’1âˆ¨y=b+1))âˆ¨(y=bâˆ§(x=aâˆ’1âˆ¨x=a+1))\forall x, y, a, b \, \text{Adjacent}(x, y, a, b) \Leftrightarrow (x=a \land (y=b-1 \lor y=b+1)) \lor (y=b \land (x=a-1 \lor x=a+1))âˆ€x,y,a,bAdjacent(x,y,a,b)â‡”(x=aâˆ§(y=bâˆ’1âˆ¨y=b+1))âˆ¨(y=bâˆ§(x=aâˆ’1âˆ¨x=a+1))
  • ì¼ë°˜ ê·œì¹™ (General rules):
    • âˆ€s,tâ€‰At(Agent,s,t)âˆ§Breeze(t)â‡’Breezy(s)\forall s, t \, At(\text{Agent}, s, t) \land \text{Breeze}(t) \Rightarrow \text{Breezy}(s)âˆ€s,tAt(Agent,s,t)âˆ§Breeze(t)â‡’Breezy(s) (ì—ì´ì „íŠ¸ê°€ ì–´ë–¤ ì¹¸ sssì— ìˆê³  ë°”ëŒì„ ì¸ì§€í•˜ë©´, ê·¸ ì¹¸ sssëŠ” ì‚°ë“¤ë°”ëŒì´ ìˆìŒ.)
    • âˆ€sâ€‰Breezy(s)â‡”âˆƒrâ€‰Adjacent(r,s)âˆ§Pit(r)\forall s \, \text{Breezy}(s) \Leftrightarrow \exists r \, \text{Adjacent}(r, s) \land \text{Pit}(r)âˆ€sBreezy(s)â‡”âˆƒrAdjacent(r,s)âˆ§Pit(r) (ì¹¸ sssê°€ ì‚°ë“¤ë°”ëŒì´ ìˆëŠ” ê²ƒì€ ì´ì›ƒ ì¹¸ rrrì— êµ¬ë©ì´ê°€ ìˆì„ ë•Œë§Œ ì„±ë¦½.)
